summary: The regional athletic association has revised its eligibility rules to allow transgender athletes to compete in categories matching their gender identity, following extensive consultations.
A popular musician is launching a new line of children's clothing inspired by their own experience as a parent, focusing on sustainable and comfortable materials.
A marathon was marred by controversy after a referee's decision to penalize several runners for improper conduct, raising questions about enforcement consistency in endurance events.
An award-winning director has surprised industry insiders by transitioning from film to virtual reality projects, aiming to pioneer new storytelling techniques.
An innovative grassroots campaign has successfully advocated for the inclusion of women's sports in a national athletic festival, highlighting community support for gender equality in sports.
A globally recognized film actor marks 30 years in the industry with a retrospective film festival showcasing their most acclaimed works.
